body: Hi Cheney Good news, I have also added the second filter, take a look here: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BjPsdF1MrUkFOk6JWk1X3HQxYwoWWCGVRUrURNunh5lyYU916TAlJVrcjUOAF3RNOVOAWXvvLC9fN5PVCxdBqm8fFsql4VrS/sun_alt_01.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BjPsdF1MrUlpdyF2CG2Yvy2bzpsL3P*PcdD4RvcplGCt99cMSP9hnHy*UPSOnsTafYfaaVUy*2p*Avf0O2x8Y4j4h836DJIA/sun_alt_02.png) Now you can combine the two filters. I have to do a couple of checks, however I think it is already good. Best Antonello
